attributes.action: All local medical centres should be obliged to have GPs of both sexes available.
attributes.additional_details: I recently had a cancer scare relating to my genitalia. I had to go privately to get this checked out as my GP is a woman who recently replaced my longstanding male doctor. The practice has no male GPS on its books at all.
attributes.background: Make the provision of both male and female GPS a legal requirement at all surgeries.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about who to have on staff at a medical centre are an operational matter for individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
